cause.description:
WE ARE NOT FOR THE LEGALIZATION OF DRUGS FOR EVERYONE, JUST THOSE WHO REALLY NEED THEM TO FUNCTION IN EVERYDAY LIFE WITHOUT EXPERIENCING PAIN IN ANY DEGREE FROM SOME SORT OF DISEASE (ALS, MS, ETC). PLEASE RECRUIT AS MANY PEOPLE AS YOU CAN! -------------------------------------------------------------- The Multidisciplinary Association for Psychedelic Studies (MAPS) is one of the only nonprofits of its kind. ---------------------------------------------------------------- (MAPS) is a membership-based, IRS-approved 501(c)(3) non-profit research and educational organization. They assist scientists to design, fund, obtain approval for and report on studies into the risks and benefits of MDMA, psychedelic drugs, and marijuana (maps.org). ---------------------------------------------------------------- MAPS' mission is to sponsor scientific research designed to develop psychedelics and marijuana into FDA-approved prescription medicines, and to educate the public honestly about the risks and benefits of these drugs (maps.org). ---------------------------------------------------------------- http://codetry.com/beneficiaries/1743
1. Allow research of therapeutic psychedelic compounds
2. Reschedule substances listed as "I" based on new research findings
3. Allow the suffering to use psychotropic substancess to treat condition(s) (ALS, MS, etc)
cause.mission: Further the research necessary to legalize psychotropic drugs for therapeutic purposes.
cause.name: Psychotropic ("mind-altering") Drugs for Therapy
